message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and simple!
I'll give you 40, you can't do better than that!
I think I can do better than that!
I'll give you 55, that's the best I can do for now!
No way, 30 is too low! I'm not going down that far!
Let's meet in the middle, 52/48 is a fair split!
You're getting low, I'm taking 80, it's now or never!
No way, 20 is way too low! I'm not going to let you take everything!
I'll give you 60, that's a more reasonable split!
You're running out of time, 90 is my final offer!
No way, 10 is way too low! I'm not going to accept such a bad deal!
I'll give you 58, it's the best I can do at this point!
This is my last chance, 95 or nothing!
No way, 5 is way too low! I'm not going to accept such a bad deal!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm taking 99, you get 1, it's the last chance!
No way, 1 is way too low! I'd rather get nothing than accept this terrible deal!
